summary: MY 1999 TOWN AND COUNTRY AIR BAG WARNING LIGHT CAME ON, HORN, AND CRUISE CONTROL HAVE STOPPED WORKING. DEALER CLAIMS IT'S A DEFECTIVE CLOCKSPRING ASSEMBLY AND THEY ARE BEING RECALLED IN THE 1996-98 YEAR MODELS, BUT NOT 1999. MY COST - $180. I BELIEVE 1999 YEAR MODELS SHOULD BE INCLUDED AS WELL. I SEE FROM YOUR WEBSITE THAT I AM NOT THE ONLY PERSON IN THE 1999 YEAR CATEGORY THAT HAS HAD THIS PROBLEM (OR SHOULD I SAY THE PRIVILAGE OF PAYING FOR IT).  *AK
